definition: to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: Place the rice noodles in a large bowl, and cover with warm water.
sentences.chinese: 把米線放進一個大碗裏，然後用溫水浸泡。

sentences.english: Put the clothes into the dryer when you get home.
sentences.chinese: 到家後就把衣服放進乾衣機裏。

sentences.english: The scientists considered putting a small mechanical mixer in the storage tank.
sentences.chinese: 科學家們考慮在儲存罐裏放進小型機械攪拌機。

sentences.english: E. g. : The thief was caught red-handed just as he was putting the watch in his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 當小偷把表放進口袋裏時，他被當場抓住了。

sentences.english: "Don't put all your eggs in one basket." is all wrong.
sentences.chinese: “別把所有的雞蛋放進一個籃子”之說大錯特錯。

sentences.english: Blindy felt it before he put it in his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 盲漢摸了摸硬幣，然後放進口袋。

sentences.english: They plopped each turtle into a small pool surrounded by magnetic coils.
sentences.chinese: 他們把每個海龜放進有磁線圈圍繞的小池子裏。

sentences.english: No, Put the bag in first.
She crushed the bootee back into the basket and squeezed past the guardhouse.
sentences.chinese: 她把幼兒小毛線鞋放進籃子裏面，擠過警衛室。

sentences.english: Someone put me into a mail sorter.
sentences.chinese: 有人把我放進了一個郵件分撿機。

sentences.english: The coaches told me to dunk, but I would lay the ball in.
sentences.chinese: 教練要求我去灌籃，但我會把球輕輕的放進籃筐。

sentences.english: Can I place tomorrow's gold in today's purse?
sentences.chinese: 我能把明天的金幣放進今天的錢袋裏嗎？

sentences.english: I quickly scooped up another ravioli and popped it in my mouth.
sentences.chinese: 我飛快地舀起一個餛飩，放進嘴裏。

sentences.english: Put some orange peels in the refrigerator and they can absorb odd smell.
sentences.chinese: 把橘子皮放進冰箱裏可以把異味吸掉。

sentences.english: I place my block of cream cheese into my mixer.
sentences.chinese: 把一塊奶油乳酪放進混鐵爐。

sentences.english: Separate large amounts of leftovers into small, shallow containers.
sentences.chinese: 把大量的剩菜分開放進又小又淺的容器中。
